flawed_nl_solution:
This week, 80 - 20 = <<80-20=60>>60 people watched the first game.
While 80 + 15 = <<80+15=95>>95 people watched the third game.
A total of 80 + 60 + 95 = <<80+60+95=253>>253 people watched the games this week.
Thus, 253 - 200 = <<253-200=53>>53 more people watched the games this week than last week.
#### 53

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 235, not 253. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
